page.title: 09Church Services in Stonegate
page.content:
Every Sunday there is a celebration of Holy Communion at 8am. At 10.30am there is a Family Service on the first Sunday of the month,Morning Prayer on the second and fourth Sundays of the month,and Choral Communion on the remaining Sundays in that month.There is a choir.The Parochial Church Council has 14 members. There is a fortnightly Prayer Meeting and in the winter months a Parish Bible Study. The Sunday School meets at 10.30am every Sunday in its own room attached to the church.
The Parish are thankful to people of vision in the past who gave us such a church to meet the living needs of today,where people can worship God,hear the Gospel and be instructed in the Faith.
